column4: Another symptom is that from the places menu I can only get stuff to open if I right-click it. If I left-click, nothing...

Running Ubuntu 9.04 64-amd; Could someone please tell me why I can open apps from the menu using alt-f1 and selecting an app with 'enter', but can't open apps with a mouse click? Very weird... plaz help
could anyone at least point me in the right direction?
bluetooth mouse? compiz enabled? please more details
